text:
The Smarter Web Company (
#SWC
) RNS Announcement: Result Of WRAP Retail Offer & Accelerated Bookbuild

Andrew Webley
@asjwebley
, CEO of The Smarter Web Company said "We are pleased to have secured this funding at the market price giving a strong vote of confidence in our vision and progress since listing on the Aquis Stock Exchange.

I would like to thank all our investors, both new and existing, for their support.

Our team remains laser focused on executing our strategy and as we move forward, we are committed to keeping investors informed with transparency as we grow."

Please read the RNS on our website:
investors.smarterwebcompany.â€¦

text:
Web design, web development and online marketing services.

Speak to one of our friendly team and let us design and build a beautiful website for you. We also provide full content management so that you can update your site whenever you wish. As standard you benefit from ongoing support, when you need it.

Find out more about what we do and how we can help you today:
smarterwebcompany.co.uk/
We are happy to accept payment in Bitcoin.

text:
Thank you to everyone who has supported The Smarter Web Company (
#SWC
) so far.

Today we have completed the first full week of trading on the stock market.

The shares closed at 4.5p to 5.0p today and based on average daily volume we are the most liquid stock on the
@Aquis_Exchange
.

Really appreciate the support and we are looking forward to the next few weeks (and then beyond).

text:
The Smarter Web Company (
#SWC
) RNS Announcement: Result Of WRAP Retail Offer & Accelerated Bookbuild.

The funding price is more than 50% above the price of the previous funding. The funding total is more than 50% larger than the total of the previous funding.

Andrew Webley
@asjwebley
, CEO of The Smarter Web Company said "We are pleased to have secured another round of funding at the market price and are grateful for the continued support of shareholders, whilst also welcoming some new shareholders. 

Our strategy is clearly defined, and in the short term we are firmly focused on short term organic growth alongside smarter treasury management."

Please read the RNS on our website:

text:
The Smarter Web Company (
#SWC
) RNS Announcement: OTCQB Application and Holdings after Fundraising

Andrew Webley
@asjwebley
, CEO of The Smarter Web Company said: "While our core focus remains on building a strong, UK-based business, we are seeing global interest in our Company. 

Enabling access for North American investors through the OTCQB is a natural step in broadening our reach.

We are committed to delivering long-term shareholder value and believe that improving accessibility to our shares globally makes this a strategically sound and timely initiative.

We've already become the most liquid stock on the Aquis Exchange in our short time as a public company, and this cross-trading arrangement is expected to enhance that liquidity even further."

Please read the RNS on our website:
investors.smarterwebcompany.â€¦
